New Records: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander finished with 33 points and 11 rebounds for the Thunder, Jayson Tatum had 26 points and 10 rebounds for the Celtics
Key Match Events: The Thunder outscored the Celtics 50-27 in the second half, the Celtics were just 3-for-24 on 3-pointers in the second half as their jumpers abandoned them
Pre-Game Insights: There was no need to hype up Sunday’s game, it was a showdown between the West’s best against the reigning NBA champs
Post-Match Reflections: The Celtics were an efficient machine through the first half against the league’s best defense, but they were on their heels in the second half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder improved to 30-5 with their 15th straight victory, the Celtics dropped to 26-10
Others: The Celtics finish their four-game road trip by taking on the Nuggets at 10 p.m. Tuesday in Denver
